attributes.action: Award the town of Wooten Bassett the George Cross in honour of their citizens dignity, respect and continued support of the British Armed Forces that have sadley returned home whilst killed in action.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think that the citizens of wooten bassett and their continued dedication to the british armed forces in the face of extreme sadness deserved to be honoured with the highest possible recognition that this government can bestow on them. this honour was bestowed on the island of malta for their defence and bravery during world war two and i think that the citizens of wooten bassett are just as deserving in the face of a different kind of courage.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
